text: tae hetoaveibeanchea puok anak ruomphet cheamuoynung borsa dauchaknea ning chhkblan anakdamnaer haeyning br pru td ampeuaeakrak nowkanleng chuobchoum robsa puok anak dau che neah? haey chamleuy nei krom robsa keat( lout)kmeanoavei krawpi niyeay tha chaur anak noam tearounakamm robsa a l laoh aoy puok yeung mk brasenbae anak sthet knongchamnaom anak del niyeay troemotrauv men noh
